ComicInfo.Summary: The Dollmaker creates Baby and sends her into the city to join her sisters. The Dollz meet Baby and are glad that their "father" sent her when she is the only one who proves strong enough to take down a monster who attacks. Meanwhile, Agent Joe tries to track down Senator Newman's missing daughter, little knowing that she has fallen under the influence of the Church of the Most Holy Transformation.
